name: imperial_pounds
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool body_mass_index_bmi_calculator.
Tool description: Use this API to calculate the Body Mass Index of an individual based on their height and weight.
API description: Calculates the Body Mass Index (BMI) of an individual using the imperial measurement system through an API.

weight.description: The weight of the individual in pounds (lbs).

height.description: The height of the individual in inches (in).
